des: "This is a combination of three recipes- traditional American, Irish and Italian stews. Cooked very slowly, the beef will be very tender and the flavor unique. Served with yeast rolls or other bread, it makes a full meal."
ins:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
In a large, ovenproof pot, combine beef, onions, carrots, potatoes, celery, mushrooms, mixed vegetables, tomatoes. Season with garlic, rosemary, sage, basil, salt, pepper. Pour in water.  Cover tightly with foil and bake 5 to 6 1/2 hours.
